message:
Season 4, Episode 19 – Aired: 3/31/2011
The Zarnecki Incursion
When Sheldon has his online gaming account hacked and his character stolen from, the guys team up to discover out who did it.

Season 4, Episode 21 – Aired: 4/28/2011
The Agreement Dissection
Sheldon goes dancing with the girls 
while Priya tries to break down the 
roommate agreement using legal theory.

Season 4, Episode 20 – Aired: 4/7/2011
The Herb Garden Germination
Sheldon and Amy decide to start several rumors 
about the others as a test. Meanwhile, 
Howard takes his relationship with Bernadette 
to even higher level.

Season 4, Episode 22 – Aired: 5/5/2011
The Wildebeest Implementation
Raj hopes to cure himself of his inability to talk to women. 
Meanwhile, Penny recruits Bernadette to spy on Leonard and Priya.

Season 4, Episode 23 – Aired: 5/12/2011
The Engagement Reaction
Mrs. Wolowitz ends up in the hospital after Howard tells her he's marrying Bernadette.

Season 4, Episode 24 – Aired: 5/19/2011
The Roommate Transmogrification
Hearing Star Trek sex games between Leonard and Priya sends Raj 
to live with Sheldon. Bernadette's earning her Ph.D makes 
the guys mock Wolowitz for not having one even more.
